data.name: Deck Construction Rules
data.ability:
※This explanatory card cannot be registered in a deck.

[Deck Construction Rules]
"Oshi HoloMember Cards," "HoloMember Cards," and "Spot HoloMember Cards" can only use talents included in the Booster Pack "Curious Universe."
※If a talent is included in Booster Pack "Curious Universe," cards of that talent released or distributed outside of "Curious Universe" can also be used. However, hBP02-072 〈Magical Girl Shion〉 and hBP02-073 〈Magical Girl Marine〉 cannot be used.
※Other cards, such as Support cards, follow normal deck construction rules.

<Example: In the case of Shirakami Fubuki>
Since Shirakami Fubuki's cards are included in Booster Pack "Curious Universe," Shirakami Fubuki's cards included in Booster Pack "Quintet Spectrum" can also be used.

When you attach this Fan to a HoloMember from your hand or Archive, you can move 1 Cheer from your Stage to the HoloMember with this Fan attached.

This Fan can only be attached to your Hakui Koyori, and any number of copies can be attached to one Hakui Koyori.

data.name: Yukimin
data.ability:
The HoloMember with this Fan attached deals +10 Special Damage to the opponent's Center HoloMember.

This Fan can only be attached to your Yukihana Lamy, and any number of copies can be attached to one Yukihana Lamy.

keyword.name: If I Can Be Someone's Sprout
keyword.description: You can roll a die once: If you roll a 1, 3, or 5, reveal 1 [Red Cheer or Blue Cheer] from your Cheer Deck, and send it to your Back HoloMember. Then shuffle your Cheer Deck.

data.name: ReGLOSS
data.ability:
You cannot use this card unless you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, not including this card.

Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. From among them, reveal any number of HoloMembers with #ReGLOSS, and add the revealed HoloMembers to your hand. Then return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

LIMITED: You can only use 1 per turn.

arts.description: You can roll a die once: If you roll an odd number, send 1 card from the top of your Cheer Deck to this HoloMember. If you roll an even number, draw 1 card from your deck.

keyword.description: When your Center HoloMember has #Gamers, deal 10 Special Damage to the opponent's Center HoloMember and one Back HoloMember. However, your opponent's Life is not reduced even if they are downed.

data.name: Shiranui Kensetsu
data.ability:
This card can only be played if you have 6 or fewer cards in your hand, not including this card.

Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. From among them, reveal any number of <Shiranui Flare>, <Omaru Polka>, <Sakura Miko>, <Hoshimachi Suisei>, and <Shirogane Noel>, and add the revealed HoloMembers to your hand. Then, return the remaining cards to the bottom of your deck in any order.

LIMITED: Only one can be played per turn.
